body.description: We invented a unique pillow-in-pillow design that’s built to satisfy all sleepers. We slept on over 60 different kinds of pillows from around the world to find the best fill types. Our pillow’s buoyant core and plush, resilient, outer layer join forces to support all sleeping positions. Filled with nearly a billion microfibers, the pillow is adaptive and will respond to your movements throughout the night. Complete with a breathable cotton cover, the pillow is easily machine washable and dryable.

productInformation.name: Special Feature
productInformation.value: Removable Cover, Washable, Neck Support, Cooling

productInformation.name: Product Care Instructions
productInformation.value: Machine Wash, Before you wash your pillow, separate the inner and outer pillows and rezip the outer pillow., Washable Pillow: We recommend washing your pillows as the seasons change, or every 3-­6 months, Run the rinse cycle twice to remove all detergent residue, and tumble dry low with dryer balls (pro tip: try clean tennis balls!)., Before removing and reassembling, make sure the pillows are completely dry.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Soft, yet supportive. Our innovative pillow-in-pillow design combines a supportive inner pillow with a soft outer pillow, so you don’t have to pick one or the other.

Sleep Cool All Night The 100% cotton cover features a breathable percale weave. It increases airflow so you’re always sleeping cool. Promotes Health Neck Alignment An innovative pillow- in-pillow design. The inner pillow is supportive, while the outer pillow adds a soft touch of fluff. Luxurious Huggable Down Each down-alternative fiber cluster is individually blown into the cover. This advanced process makes the pillow resistant to clumping, meaning it can bounce back to life with just a quick fluff.

Original Pillow Down Pillow Foam Pillow Essential Pillow Hybrid Pillow Foam Snow Pillow Cover Material 100% Cotton 100% Polyester 88% Polyester, 12% Spandex 100% Cotton 92% Polyester, 8% Spandex 92% Polyester, 8% Spandex Fill Fiber Feather Foam Fiber Fiber and foam Foam Description Our innovative pillow-in-pillow design responds to your movements. The inner pillow is filled with shorter fibers for adaptive support. The outer pillow features clump-resistant fibers for added softness. The unique 5-chamber design combines cloud-like comfort with adaptive support. The inner chambers adapt to any sleep position, so your neck stays comfortable throughout the night. The outer chambers add a touch of fluff for luxurious comfort. The 3-layer design contours to your head and neck in all sleep positions for optimal comfort. Plus, AirScape perforated foam helps keep you comfortably asleep. The outer chambers are filled with long, silky fibers for a light, plush feel that helps lull you to sleep. Shorter fibers in the inner chamber offer responsive support that moves with you in any position. Our innovative, 3-layer foam + fiber design combines squishable comfort with consistent support. No fluffing necessary! Three layers of breathable foam keep your head and neck aligned. HeatDelete bands and Snow Technology give you cooler sleep for 12+ hours. Plus, AirScape foam features hundreds of perforations to keep air circulating. Firmness Supportive and soft Plush and responsive Firm and supportive Supportive and soft Plush Firm and supportive Gusset 2" 2" 1.25" 2" 2" 1.25" Two Pack ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Machine Washable ✓ ✓ Dry clean only Dry clean only Dry clean only Dry clean only

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Finally Found the Right Pillow To Support My Neck
reviews.reviewText: I’ve dealt with neck pain for years and have tried lots of pillows. The Casper Original Pillow is the one that finally helps me get a good night’s sleep and awaken without neck pain. I agree with other reviewers who’ve said it’s like sleeping on a cloud while providing the right amount of firmness and support that holds the head in alignment with the spine without putting pressure on the shoulder. I’m a side and back sleeper and it’s great for both positions. The fabric is a little crunchy, but that’s a very small minus compared to all the pluses.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars they felt good the first night
reviews.reviewText: I liked my previous pillow (a medium firmness MyPillow - 5+ years old) but it was time to get a new matching set.On first lay they feel like nice hotel pillows. The surface is cool. It almost feels like a gel. I felt comfortable when I laid down to sleep, fell asleep quickly, and slept well through the night! My neck was still comfortable in the morning.I usually sleep on my side.Now we have a Casper mattress, dog bed, and pillows! I recommend!Update: After one week I'm still very happy with my pillow. My fiance seems fairly happy and has taken out the inner pillow to make two pillows which she sleeps on stacked. She says that's working better for her. She did not like either of her previous pillows.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Expensive, but nice pillow
reviews.reviewText: I have to praise the Casper Sleep Original Pillow for its unique design and the way it contours to the shape of the head and neck. The pillow is made from a combination of memory foam and down-alternative fibers, which provides both support and comfort. The outer cover is made from a breathable and soft cotton material, which helps keep the pillow cool and comfortable.One of the standout features of the Casper Sleep Original Pillow is its unique "pillow-in-pillow" design. The pillow consists of an inner pillow that provides support, surrounded by an outer pillow that adds softness and comfort. This makes it a great option for people who want a balance of support and comfort in their pillow.However, my boyfriend mentioned that the pillow may be too firm or thick for his liking, and that it may take some time to get used to the unique shape and feel of the pillow.Overall, the Casper Sleep Original Pillow seems like a high-quality and comfortable option for people who want a supportive and comfortable pillow that can provide a balance of support and comfort. While it may not be the right fit for everyone, many customers have reported improved sleep and reduced pain after using the pillow.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars END ALL BE ALL
reviews.reviewText: I sleep on nothing else but Casper! These are the BEST pillows, I keep buying them for extra beds, friends, presents, family, backup - you never know and honestly this is the only pillow that gets me the deep sleep I need. I absolutely LOVE these Casper pillows and will only ever use Casper for the rest of my life. They are soft, they hold their shape (!), they last, they mold to my every curve! I cant say enough good things about these pillows, just buy one and see for yourself - Casper is the best pillow and the last pillow you will ever buy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars 2 pillows in one.
reviews.reviewText: Interesting pillow. At first l yhought it was nice but too puffy. I thought l would take out some filling. When l looked there was a zipper and inside was another pillow. One was puffier and one less flat. This was good for me. I could crunch them up to support my neck just the way l like it.One is flatter and get thicker towards the other side. I find them ver comfortable to use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewText: We've been sleeping on these pillows for 5 years and have had much success with them. They are extremely versatile for various sleep positions. No stiff or sore neck since using this brand.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not ideal for side sleepers
reviews.reviewText: Pillow is very squishy - yes there is a pillow inside a pillow but the outer layer is very thin. Be aware it comes rolled into a tube, getting it back in to return is challenging. I decided to keep and use as a cuddle pillow rather than for my head - it may be ok for a back sleeper but hardly any support for side sleepers. Makes a good pillow for hugging/squeezing but a bit pricy just for that.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really like it!
reviews.reviewText: Perfect pillow for me I sleep on my back and on my side. This pillow keeps my neck at the perfect angle, which helps me sleep better. Fewer aches and pains when I wake up too! I’m impressed! 😴
I keep ordering this pillow because it's the best. Nice and soft but supportive.
Me gusta su textura y consistencia
Purchased Casper Pillows in the past and loved themNeeded two new pillows for the spare room Casper was my first choiceWould recommend this product

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: Fantastic pillow for side and back sleepers
reviews.reviewText: I rarely post reviews, but this pillow is simply fantastic! I'm mostly a side sleeper and an occasional back sleeper, and this superb pillow is appropriate for both positions, i.e. medium-firm support which is soft, deep, and luxurious. This pillow matches up to the high quality pillows I've used when staying in top hotels. I did a lot of research, and even ordered a few pillows from elsewhere (subsequently returned), but this is by far my best purchase of the year so far. Highly recommended.
